sentences.en: Chobe is also renowned for its large herds of elephant and buffalo.
sentences.cn: 乔贝还以其大群的大象和水牛而闻名。

sentences.en: He had no opinions of his own but simply follow the herd.
sentences.cn: 他从无主见,只是人云亦云.

sentences.en: His herd of 170 dairy cattle and 200 young stock are kept on the land.
sentences.cn: 他那170头奶牛和200头乳牛都在那块地上圈养。

sentences.en: It was Tom’s duty to herd the cows.

sentences.en: The milkman selected the spotted cows, from among a herd of two hundred.
sentences.cn: 牛奶商从一群200头牛中选出有斑点的牛.

sentences.en: The prisoners were herded together .

sentences.en: Under the banner of education, we herd our children from ballet to basketball and back again.
sentences.cn: 打着教育的旗号，我们赶鸭子上架似的让孩子从芭蕾到篮球，不停地学这个学那个。

sentences.en: You have to be an individual; it’s no use running with the herd.
sentences.cn: 你必须特立独行，随大溜没有用处。
